document.full_text: syrian security forces intensified their assault on protesters calling for president bashar al-assad to quit, killing at least 34 demonstrators in the latest crackdown in the city of hama, activists said.
document.title: syria intensifies assault on anti-assad protesters
lines_and_colors: syrian security forces intensified their assault on protesters calling for president bashar al-assad to quit, killing at least 34 demonstrators in the latest crackdown in the city of hama, activists said.
